local_intent: Place the held white plate onto red_plate: ensure red_plate is visible, move above it, align, lower until contact, verify contact, release, and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is currently held by the gripper (pick succeeded).
Red plate is within reachable workspace and detectable by the camera.
No intermediate obstacles between current pose and red_plate.
coherence_with_global: This subtree continues the global plan at the MoveAbove(red_plate) micro-goal and implements the placement steps from GLOBAL_BT: perceive red_plate, position over it, lower until contact, verify contact, open gripper to release, and retreat to a safe distance.
